#include <cstdio>
#include <iostream>
#include <vector>
#include <utility>
#include <algorithm>
#include <set>
#include <map>
#include <list>
#include <string>
#include <cstring>
using namespace std;

int main()
{
	long long T, test;
	long long N, M;
	long long i, j;
	cin>>T;
	for(test =1;test<=T;test++)
	{
		cin>>N>>M;
		long long den[N];
		double temp;
		printf("Case %d:\n",test);
		for(i=0;i<N;i++)
		{
			cin>>temp;
			den[i] = temp *100 + 0.005;
		}
		sort(den, den+N);
		for(i=1;i<=M;i++)
		{
			long long curr=N-1, ans =0;
			long long val;
			cin>>temp;
			val = temp *100 + 0.005;
			printf("Scenario %d:\n",i);
			while(val!=0)
			{
				ans = val/den[curr];
				val = val % den[curr];
				if(ans!=0)
					if(den[curr]%100 == 0)
						printf("%lld %lld\n",den[curr]/100, ans);
					else
						printf("%.2lf %lld\n",(double)den[curr]/100.0, ans);
				curr--;
			}
		}
	}
	return 0;
}
